```{r}
#| label: render
#| eval: false
# Not evaluated chunk, execute it to render a final version of the report.
# Keep this chunk at the end of the file.

path <- rstudioapi::getActiveDocumentContext()$path
path_split <- stringr::str_split(path, "/") |> unlist()
folder <- tail(path_split, 2)[1]
file <- tail(path_split, 1) |> 
  stringr::str_remove("\\..+$")

setwd(here::here(folder))
quarto::quarto_render(
  input = path,
  output_file = odytools::ody_add_version(file)
)
setwd(here::here())

rm(path, path_split, folder, file)
```
